name: Overstand Labs
headline: Leverage your customer comms to get into Founder Mode
description:
If you‚Äôre a founder and feel like you‚Äîor your exec team‚Äîare too far removed from the customer, Overstand is here to help. We‚Äôre the platform (and API) for your customer communications, turning Slack, emails, WhatsApp, call recordings, and more into actionable insights. For example, we can help you discover feature requests hidden in customer emails, spot upsell opportunities from a casual Slack message, or identify a critical support issue buried in a call transcript -- all without having to depend on others in your company to fill out a form or write meeting notes.

Get back to Founder Mode by spotting trends, uncovering growth opportunities, and staying deeply connected to your customers. Overstand makes it easy to understand where you‚Äôre needed most and take action that drives impact. üöÄ

founders.name: Derrick Cheng, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Overstand Labs | Ex-Meta | AI @ Berkeley

founders.name: Mihir Patil, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Overstand Labs. California Native. Ex-Palantir. Faculty @ NYU. Go Bears!

**Turn Every Customer Interaction into Executive Intelligence**
## **See what our platform can do for you**
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6798ae6af9d315600836f24e_search%20\(1\).png)
**Spot Issues Before They Escalate**
Know which accounts need attention before problems escalate, with AI-driven insights ensuring no customer feedback is missed.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6798ae786d773091126d3a45_connecting%20dots.png)
**Connect the Dots Across Accounts**
When multiple customers face similar issues, you'll know. When they're asking for the same feature, you'll see it. We surface patterns automatically.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6798af09f9d315600837bbb3_insight.png)
**Every Insight Has a Story**
No more "trust us" moments. Every trend and insight links back to real conversations - whether they happened in tickets, calls, or emails.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/678aed7d2f52aa5a14e889ca_Group%2032%20\(3\).png)
**Zero Process Change**
Keep working exactly as you do now. No new forms. No extra steps. We work in the background while you focus on what matters.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6798af18a68ae8b064ba72c1_globe%20\(2\).png)
**Everything in One Place**
Slack? Email? WhatsApp? Calls? We've got it all covered, with enterprise-grade security keeping everything safe.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6798af23563ca5d77da962bf_API.png)
**Everything accessible via our API**
Every message, every insight and every critical alert are all accessible via our easy-to-use API.
**üåê Everything in One Place**
Slack? Email? WhatsApp? Calls? We've got it all covered, with enterprise-grade security keeping everything safe.
**Comprehensive Coverage**
Analyze conversations across all channels - Slack, email, WhatsApp, calls, and more, with enterprise-grade security.
**Integratable with everything**
Overstand seamlessly integrates with all your customer communication channels, including support queues, call recordings, emails, meeting notes, and more. When we say _all customer communications_ , we mean every touchpoint you rely on.
![Tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658823_tools1.svg)![Tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658826_tools2.svg)![Tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658825_tools3.svg)![Tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658833_tools4.svg)![Tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658832_tools5.svg)![Tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658824_tools6.svg)
[Request Demo](https://overstandlabs.com/<#>)
![Email](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658817_email.svg)
Thanks for requesting a demo - we'll get in touch shortly for scheduling.
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
## **Use Cases**
**Wind Energy Software Provider**
## Problem
A software company serves 90 wind turbine operators across multiple countries. Their customers' technicians use WhatsApp to report urgent issues, email for formal requests, and Slack channels for day-to-day support. Field engineers often record voice notes during turbine inspections, while procurement teams send lengthy email threads about feature requirements.
## Solution with Overstand
With Overstand, the CRO and Head of Product get:
  * A unified dashboard showing emerging issues across all 90 operators 
  * Automatic aggregation of feature requests, with direct links to customer conversations
  * Real-time alerts when multiple customers report similar technical issues
  * Evidence-based insights traced back to specific customer messages or calls


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658835_chart1.webp)
**Construction Software Platform**
## Problem
A construction software provider serves 50 major construction firms. Site managers send urgent requests via WhatsApp, project managers conduct weekly status calls, IT teams communicate through ticketing systems, and executives exchange emails about strategic needs. With hundreds of messages flowing through different channels daily, critical feedback and requirements often get lost
## Solution with Overstand
With Overstand, the CRO and Head of Product get:
  * See which features are most requested across construction sites 
  * Identify common implementation challenges before they become systemic
  * Track sentiment across different types of users (site managers vs. project managers)
  * Access actual customer conversations that drive strategic decisions


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658835_chart1.webp)
**Enterprise Asset Management Software**
## Problem
A software company provides asset management solutions to large industrial clients. Their customers communicate through:
  * Maintenance teams sending daily updates via mobile app
  * Engineers sharing technical specs over email
  * Operations managers using video calls for monthly reviews
  * Support tickets flowing through multiple systems.


This creates a fragmented view of customer needs and issues.
## Solution with Overstand
Through Overstand, leadership can:
  * Instantly see trending maintenance issues across the customer base
  * Track feature adoption patterns from actual usage discussions
  * Identify which customers need immediate executive attention
  * Access the exact conversations that signal customer satisfaction or concern


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658835_chart1.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/67877b55b366447cd2ae3bd5_icons8-arrow-100%20\(2\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/67877a584e1bdedbdd25d80e_icons8-arrow-100%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d910658835_chart1.webp)
**Wind Energy Software Provider**

User success stories
## Our happy users are increasing day by day
![Testimonial Thumb](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d91065886b_testimonial1.webp)
"A game-changer for our business!"
"Since switching to SaaS, we've automated many processes that used to take hours. It's saved us a lot of time, and our team is now free to focus on bigger projects. We couldn't imagine going back to the old ways. To work!
‚Äî Sarah M., Operations Manager
![Testimonial Thumb](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d91065886a_testimonial2.webp)
"All our tools in one place!"
"Before this software, we worked with five different platforms. Now, everything from CRM to invoicing is centralized, making our workflow much smoother. The integration with our existing apps was also seamless!"
‚Äî Sarah M., Operations Manager
![Testimonial Thumb](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6781d59f6f9955d910658794/6781d59f6f9955d91065886c_testimonial3.webp)
"Increased our productivity by 50%!"
"Thanks to this software's automation tools, our team is now working more efficiently than ever before. Task management, client follow-up and invoicing have never been easier. We've seen a huge improvement in our output!"
‚Äî Michael R., Sales Director

generated_description:
**Overstand Labs: Bridging the Gap Between Founders and Customers**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch W25, Overstand Labs is on a mission to connect founders with their customers in a meaningful way. If you‚Äôre a startup leader feeling distant from the conversations that shape your product, Overstand has your back. Its platform and API turn everyday customer communications‚Äîthink Slack, email, WhatsApp, and call recordings‚Äîinto actionable insights without adding clutter to your workflow.

### What They Do

Overstand makes it incredibly easy to tap into crucial customer feedback that often gets lost in the noise. Whether it's discovering feature requests buried in emails or spotting upsell opportunities from casual chats on Slack, the platform aggregates and analyzes data to spotlight trends and growth opportunities. This way, founders can reclaim their ‚ÄúFounder Mode,‚Äù empowering them to take swift, impactful actions based on real-time customer interactions.

### Key Features

1. **Centralized Communication**: Overstand pulls together insights from various channels‚Äîensuring nothing slips through the cracks.
2. **Real-Time Alerts**: Be the first to know when multiple customers face the same issue or ask for the same feature.
3. **Data-Driven Decision Making**: Every insight is based on actual conversations, giving clarity and context to trends and fluctuations in customer sentiment.
4. **Integration Ready**: The platform speaks the language of your existing tools, whether it‚Äôs support queues, emails, or call logs.
5. **AI-Driven Insights**: Leverage machine learning to identify potential problems before they escalate.

### Target Audience and Use Cases

Overstand is particularly useful for companies in tech-heavy industries like wind energy or construction, where varied communication channels often lead to fragmented insights. Imagine a construction software provider managing requests from multiple firms via various platforms; Overstand simplifies this by unifying the insights.

### Team and Leadership

Situated in San Francisco, Overstand Labs is a lean team of four, led by an experienced Group Partner, Michael Seibel. Their agile approach allows them to rapidly iterate and adapt their offerings in response to user feedback.

### Why It Matters

In today‚Äôs fast-paced digital environment, leaders need to stay connected to their customers without adding layers of complexity. Overstand Labs is here to help by creating an effortless way to turn everyday conversations into strategic intelligence. This not only boosts productivity but also enriches the decision-making process, ultimately leading to better products and happier customers.

Ready to transform your customer conversations into impactful decisions? Check out Overstand Labs at [overstandlabs.com](https://overstandlabs.com) for more.

In summary, Overstand Labs is an essential partner for any founder looking to enhance their connection to customers and streamline how feedback translates to actions that matter.
